alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:26PM MST until July 30 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central La Paz County in west central Arizona... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 426 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Wenden, or 31 miles northwest of Tonopah, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wenden, Salome and Harcuvar. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 54 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
